DSI::Log

DSI::Log Namespace Reference

Enumerations

enum  Level {
  Critical = 0, Error, Warning, Info,
  Debug
}
enum  Device { SystemLog = (1 << 0), Console = (1 << 1) }

Functions

void setLevel (int level)
void setDevice (int device)

Detailed Description

DSI Logging subsystem for internal use. The only end-user access is to initialize

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Device

Device where to send the log message to.

enum Level

Severity level of logging message

Enumerator:
Critical 

critical error situation, application probably about to abort

Error 

error message, application potentially shows ill behaviour

Warning 

warning message

Info 

informational message

Debug 

debugging only message

Function Documentation

void DSI::Log::setDevice ( int  device  ) 

Set the logging device. The given argument is interpreted as bit mask as given in the Device enumerator. The default setting is to log to the system log.

void DSI::Log::setLevel ( int  level  ) 

Set the verbosity level filter. Only messages whose level is lower equal than level will afterwards produce logging output - if a device is set.
